item.text: Now a certain man named Lazarus was sick. He was from Bethany, the village where Mary and her sister Martha lived.

(<st data-num="1161">Now</st> it <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> <st data-num="3137" class="">Mary</st> who <st data-num="218" class="">anointed</st> the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> with <st data-num="3464" class="">perfumed oil</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1591" class="">wiped</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="4228" class="">feet</st> <st data-num="1591" class="">dry</st> with <st data-num="846" class="">her</st> <st data-num="2359" class="">hair</st>, <st data-num="3739" class="">whose</st> <st data-num="80" class="">brother</st> <st data-num="2976" class="">Lazarus</st> was <st data-num="770" class="">sick.)</st><n id="2" />

<st data-num="3767" class="">So</st> the <st data-num="79" class="">sisters</st> <st data-num="649" class="">sent</st> a message<n id="1" /> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">Jesus</st>,<n id="2" /> “<st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st>, <st data-num="2396" class="">look</st>, the <st data-num="3739" class="">one</st> you <st data-num="5368" class="">love</st> is <st data-num="770" class="">sick</st>.”

When <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> this, he <st data-num="3004">said</st>, “<st data-num="3778">This</st> <st data-num="769" class="">sickness</st> will <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">lead</st> <st data-num="5228" class="">to</st> <st data-num="2288" class="">death</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="5228" class="">to</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God’s</st> <st data-num="1391" class="">glory</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2443">so that</st> the <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> may be <st data-num="1392" class="">glorified</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st>.”<n id="3" />
(Now Jesus loved Martha and her sister and Lazarus.)
So when he heard that Lazarus was sick, he remained in the place where he was for two more days.

<st data-num="1899" class="">Then</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">after</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st>, he <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to his <st data-num="3101" class="">disciples</st>, “Let us <st data-num="71" class="">go</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="2449" class="">Judea</st> <st data-num="3825" class="">again</st>.”<n id="1" />

The <st data-num="3101" class="">disciples</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">replied</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="4461">Rabbi</st>, the <st data-num="2453">Jewish leaders</st><n id="2" /> were <st data-num="3568">just now</st> <st data-num="2212" class="">trying</st><n id="3" /> to <st data-num="3034" class="">stone</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="3034">to death</st>! Are<n id="4" /> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="5217" class="">going</st> <st data-num="1563" class="">there</st> <st data-num="3825" class="">again</st>?”

<st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="611" class="">replied</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="1510">Are</st> there <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1427" class="">12</st> <st data-num="5610" class="">hours</st> in a <st data-num="2250" class="">day</st>? <st data-num="1437" class="">If</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">anyone</st> <st data-num="4043">walks around</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2250" class="">daytime</st>, he does <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4350" class="">stumble</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> he <st data-num="991" class="">sees</st> the <st data-num="5457" class="">light</st> of <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st>.<n id="3" />
But if anyone walks around at night, he stumbles because the light is not in him.”
After he said this, he added, “Our friend Lazarus has fallen asleep. But I am going there to awaken him.”

<st data-num="3767" class="">Then</st> the <st data-num="3101" class="">disciples</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">replied</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="2962">Lord</st>, <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> he has <st data-num="2837">fallen asleep</st>, he will <st data-num="4982" class="">recover</st>.”
(Now Jesus had been talking about his death, but they thought he had been talking about real sleep.)
Then Jesus told them plainly, “Lazarus has died,

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> I am <st data-num="5463" class="">glad</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1223" class="">for</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">sake</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> I <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1563" class="">there</st>, <st data-num="2443" class="">so that</st> you may <st data-num="4100" class="">believe</st>.<n id="2" /> <st data-num="235" class="">But</st> let us <st data-num="71" class="">go</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.”
So Thomas (called Didymus) said to his fellow disciples, “Let us go too, so that we may die with him.”
When Jesus arrived, he found that Lazarus had been in the tomb four days already.

(<st data-num="1161">Now</st> <st data-num="963" class="">Bethany</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> <st data-num="1451">less than</st> <st data-num="4712 1178">two miles</st><n id="1" /> from <st data-num="2414" class="">Jerusalem</st>,<n id="2" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">so</st> <st data-num="4183" class="">many</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">of</st> the <st data-num="2453">Jewish people</st> of the region<n id="1" /> had <st data-num="2064" class="">come</st> <st data-num="4314">to</st> <st data-num="3136" class="">Martha</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3137" class="">Mary</st> <st data-num="2443" class="">to</st> <st data-num="3888" class="">console</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="4012" class="">over</st> the loss of their <st data-num="80" class="">brother.)</st><n id="3" />

<st data-num="3767" class="">So</st> when <st data-num="3136" class="">Martha</st> <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> was <st data-num="2064" class="">coming</st>, she went out to <st data-num="5221" class="">meet</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> <st data-num="3137" class="">Mary</st> was <st data-num="2516" class="">sitting</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="3624" class="">house</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="3136" class="">Martha</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3004">said</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st>, “<st data-num="2962">Lord</st>, <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> you had <st data-num="1510" class="">been</st> <st data-num="5602" class="">here</st>, <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="80" class="">brother</st> <st data-num="302" class="">would</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> have <st data-num="599" class="">died</st>.
But even now I know that whatever you ask from God, God will grant you.”
Jesus replied, “Your brother will come back to life again.”

<st data-num="3136" class="">Martha</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>,<n id="1" /> “I <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> he will <st data-num="450">come back to life again</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="386" class="">resurrection</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">at</st> the <st data-num="2078" class="">last</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">day</st>.”

<st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">her</st>, “<st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">am</st> the <st data-num="386" class="">resurrection</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="2222" class="">life</st>. The one who <st data-num="4100" class="">believes</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> will <st data-num="2198" class="">live</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2579">even if</st> he <st data-num="599" class="">dies</st>,

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the one who <st data-num="2198" class="">lives</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4100" class="">believes</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> will <st data-num="3756 3361">never</st> <st data-num="599" class="">die</st>.<n id="1" /> Do you <st data-num="4100" class="">believe</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st>?”
She replied, “Yes, Lord, I believe that you are the Christ, the Son of God who comes into the world.”
And when she had said this, Martha went and called her sister Mary, saying privately, “The Teacher is here and is asking for you.”

<st data-num="1161" class="">So</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">when</st> <st data-num="1565">Mary</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> this, she <st data-num="1453" class="">got up</st> <st data-num="5036">quickly</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2064" class="">went</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.

(<st data-num="1161">Now</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> had <st data-num="3768">not yet</st> <st data-num="2064" class="">entered</st> the <st data-num="2968" class="">village</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> <st data-num="2089" class="">still</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="5117" class="">place</st> <st data-num="3699" class="">where</st> <st data-num="3136" class="">Martha</st> had <st data-num="5221">come out to meet</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him.)</st>
Then the people who were with Mary in the house consoling her saw her get up quickly and go out. They followed her because they thought she was going to the tomb to weep there.
Now when Mary came to the place where Jesus was and saw him, she fell at his feet and said to him, “Lord, if you had been here, my brother would not have died.”

<st data-num="5613">When</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="846" class="">her</st> <st data-num="2799" class="">weeping</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the people<n id="1" /> who had <st data-num="4905" class="">come with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">her</st> <st data-num="2799" class="">weeping</st>, he was <st data-num="1690">intensely moved</st><n id="2" /> in <st data-num="4151" class="">spirit</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5015">greatly distressed</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">He</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">asked</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="4226">Where</st> have you <st data-num="5087" class="">laid</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>?”<n id="2" /> They <st data-num="3004" class="">replied</st>,<n id="3" /> “<st data-num="2962">Lord</st>, <st data-num="2064" class="">come</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">see</st>.”
<st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="1145" class="">wept</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="3767" class="">Thus</st> the <st data-num="2453" class="">people</st> who had come to mourn<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="2396">Look</st> <st data-num="4459">how much</st> he <st data-num="5368" class="">loved</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>!”
But some of them said, “This is the man who caused the blind man to see! Couldn’t he have done something to keep Lazarus from dying?”
Jesus, intensely moved again, came to the tomb. (Now it was a cave, and a stone was placed across it.)

<st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="142">Take away</st> the <st data-num="3037" class="">stone</st>.”<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3136" class="">Martha</st>, the <st data-num="79" class="">sister</st> of the <st data-num="5053" class="">deceased</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="3004" class="">replied</st>, “<st data-num="2962">Lord</st>, <st data-num="2235">by this time</st> the body will have a bad <st data-num="3605">smell</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1063" class="">because</st> he <st data-num="1510">has been</st> buried<n id="4" /> <st data-num="5066">four days</st>.”<n id="5" />

<st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">responded</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="3756">Didn’t</st> I <st data-num="3004">tell</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="1437" class="">if</st> you <st data-num="4100" class="">believe</st>, you would <st data-num="3708" class="">see</st> the <st data-num="1391" class="">glory</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>?”

<st data-num="3767" class="">So</st> they <st data-num="142" class="">took away</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="3037" class="">stone</st>. <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="142 3788">looked</st> <st data-num="507" class="">upward</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st>, “<st data-num="3962">Father</st>, I <st data-num="2168" class="">thank</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> you have <st data-num="191" class="">listened</st> to <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">knew</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> you <st data-num="3842" class="">always</st> <st data-num="191" class="">listen</st> to <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> I <st data-num="3004">said</st> this<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1223">for the sake of</st> the <st data-num="3793" class="">crowd</st> <st data-num="4026">standing around</st> here, <st data-num="2443" class="">that</st> they <st data-num="2443" class="">may</st> <st data-num="4100" class="">believe</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="649" class="">sent</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>.”

When<n id="1" /> he had <st data-num="3004">said</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st>, he <st data-num="2905" class="">shouted</st> in a <st data-num="3173" class="">loud</st> <st data-num="5456" class="">voice</st>,<n id="2" /> “<st data-num="2976">Lazarus</st>, <st data-num="1204" class="">come</st> <st data-num="1854" class="">out</st>!”
The one who had died came out, his feet and hands tied up with strips of cloth, and a cloth wrapped around his face. Jesus said to them, “Unwrap him and let him go.”
Then many of the people, who had come with Mary and had seen the things Jesus did, believed in him.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">some</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">of</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="565" class="">went</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="5330" class="">Pharisees</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">reported</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3739" class="">what</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> had <st data-num="4160" class="">done</st>.

<st data-num="3767" class="">So</st> the <st data-num="749">chief priests</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="5330" class="">Pharisees</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4863" class="">called</st> the <st data-num="4892" class="">council</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="4863" class="">together</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="5101">What</st> are we <st data-num="4160" class="">doing</st>? <st data-num="3754" class="">For</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="444" class="">man</st> is <st data-num="4160" class="">performing</st> <st data-num="4183" class="">many</st> <st data-num="4592">miraculous signs</st>.
If we allow him to go on in this way, everyone will believe in him, and the Romans will come and take away our sanctuary and our nation.”
Then one of them, Caiaphas, who was high priest that year, said, “You know nothing at all!

You do <st data-num="3761" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3049" class="">realize</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> it is <st data-num="4851">more</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="4851" class="">advantage</st> <st data-num="2443" class="">to</st> have <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> <st data-num="444" class="">man</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="599" class="">die</st> <st data-num="5228" class="">for</st> the <st data-num="2992" class="">people</st> than for the <st data-num="3650" class="">whole</st> <st data-num="1484" class="">nation</st> to <st data-num="622" class="">perish</st>.”<n id="3" />

(<st data-num="1161">Now</st> he did <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3004">say</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="575" class="">on</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">his own</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> because he <st data-num="1510">was</st> <st data-num="749">high priest</st> <st data-num="1565">that</st> <st data-num="1763" class="">year</st>, he <st data-num="4395" class="">prophesied</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> was <st data-num="3195">going to</st> <st data-num="599" class="">die</st> <st data-num="5228" class="">for</st> the Jewish <st data-num="1484" class="">nation</st>,<n id="2" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="5228" class="">for</st> the Jewish <st data-num="1484" class="">nation</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3441">only</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="2443">to</st> <st data-num="4863">gather together</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> the <st data-num="5043" class="">children</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> who are <st data-num="1287">scattered</st>.)<n id="4" />
So from that day they planned together to kill him.
Thus Jesus no longer went around publicly among the Judeans, but went away from there to the region near the wilderness, to a town called Ephraim, and stayed there with his disciples.

<st data-num="1161">Now</st> the <st data-num="2453" class="">Jewish</st> Feast of <st data-num="3957" class="">Passover</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> <st data-num="1451" class="">near</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4183">many people</st> <st data-num="305">went up</st> <st data-num="1519">to</st> <st data-num="2414" class="">Jerusalem</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="5561">rural areas</st> <st data-num="4253" class="">before</st> the <st data-num="3957" class="">Passover</st> <st data-num="2443" class="">to</st> <st data-num="48" class="">cleanse</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">themselves</st> <st data-num="48" class="">ritually</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="3767" class="">Thus</st> they were <st data-num="2212">looking for</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st> <st data-num="3326">to</st> <st data-num="240">one another</st> as they <st data-num="2476" class="">stood</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2411">temple courts</st>,<n id="2" /> “<st data-num="5101">What</st> do <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1380" class="">think</st>? <st data-num="3754" class="">That</st> <st data-num="2064" class="">he</st> <st data-num="3756 3361">won’t</st> <st data-num="2064" class="">come</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="1859" class="">feast</st>?”
(Now the chief priests and the Pharisees had given orders that anyone who knew where Jesus was should report it, so that they could arrest him.)
